alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Essex; Eastern Passaic; Eastern Union; Hudson; Western Bergen; Western Essex; Western Passaic; Western Union (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 2:44PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...ELEVATED RISK OF FIRE SPREAD THIS AFTERNOON AND EARLY THIS EVENING... A dry air mass will combine with increasing southwest winds to create conditions more conducive for fire spread this afternoon and early this evening. Relative humidity is expected to decrease to near 20 percent, with some wind gusts close to 20 mph. These conditions would likely aid fire spread if ignition occurs. Exercise caution if handling any potential ignition source, including machinery, cigarettes, and matches. Be sure to properly discard all smoking materials. Any dry grasses, dead leaves, and other tree litter that ignite could have the potential to spread fire quickly. For more information about wildfire danger, burn restrictions, and wildfire prevention and education, please visit your state`s forestry or environmental protection web site.
